value:
SELECT
SRC.src_sys_cd,
SRC.ref_id,
SRC.ref_cd, 
SRC.ref_desc,
SRC.ref_alt_val,
SRC.mkt_key,
SRC.mkt_ref_code,
SRC.mkt_ref_code_desc,
SRC.mkt_ref_code_alt_val,
SRC.gbl_key,
SRC.gbl_ref_code,
SRC.gbl_ref_code_desc,
SRC.ref_type_cd,
SRC.ref_data_set_cd,
SRC.ref_rec_eff_dtm,
SRC.rec_exp_dtm,
SRC.row_process_dtm,
SRC.etl_audit_id,
LKP.MAX_SID
FROM
(
SELECT
STG.src_sys_cd,
STG.ref_id,
STG.ref_cd, 
STG.ref_desc,
STG.ref_alt_val,
STG.mkt_key,
STG.mkt_ref_code,
STG.mkt_ref_code_desc,
STG.mkt_ref_code_alt_val,
STG.gbl_key,
STG.gbl_ref_code,
STG.gbl_ref_code_desc,
STG.ref_type_cd,
STG.ref_data_set_cd,
STG.ref_rec_eff_dtm,
STG.rec_exp_dtm,
STG.row_process_dtm,
STG.etl_audit_id,
1 AS DUMMY
FROM cdp_stg_dwh.stg_tref_code_map_variant STG
WHERE LOWER(STG.ref_type_cd)='recovery_type' 
AND STG.src_sys_cd='penta') AS SRC
LEFT JOIN (SELECT 1 as DUMMY, max(dim_recov_type_key) AS MAX_SID from cdp_dwh.dim_recov_type_t) LKP
ON LKP.DUMMY=SRC.DUMMY

SELECT
STG.dim_recov_type_key,
STG.recov_type_cd,
STG.recov_type_desc,
STG.recov_type_alt_val,
STG.src_sys_cd,
STG.mkt_recov_type_key,
STG.mkt_recov_type_cd,
STG.mkt_recov_type_desc,
STG.mkt_recov_type_alt_val,
STG.gbl_recov_type_key,
STG.gbl_recov_type_cd,
STG.gbl_recov_type_desc,
STG.rec_crt_dtm,
STG.rec_updt_dtm,
STG.actv_rec_ind,
STG.etl_audit_id
FROM cdp_dwh.dim_recov_type_t STG
WHERE STG.src_sys_cd='penta'
